4 LDA model

Source: vignettes/articles/4-LDA-model.Rmd
4-LDA-model.Rmd
library(rfintext)
library(quanteda)
library(topicmodels)
library(topicdoc)
library(dplyr)
library(doFuture)
plan(multisession)
dtm <- aspol |>
  preprocess_corpus() |>
  corpus_to_dtm(kunta, LEMMA)
#> Dropped 216172 rows
#> Dropped 2263 rows
#> Dropped 18 rows
#> Dropped 31789 rows
#> Dropped 21951 rows
#> Dropped 4834 rows

Optimal values for k are 2, 6, 9 and 16.

k_values <- c(2, 6, 9, 16)
results <- foreach(k = k_values) %dofuture% {
  topicmodels::LDA(quanteda::convert(dtm, to = "tm"), k = k, control = list(seed = 1234))
}
#> Warning in .recacheSubclasses(def@className, def, env): undefined subclass
#> "ndiMatrix" of class "replValueSp"; definition not updated

#> Warning in .recacheSubclasses(def@className, def, env): undefined subclass
#> "ndiMatrix" of class "replValueSp"; definition not updated

#> Warning in .recacheSubclasses(def@className, def, env): undefined subclass
#> "ndiMatrix" of class "replValueSp"; definition not updated

#> Warning in .recacheSubclasses(def@className, def, env): undefined subclass
#> "ndiMatrix" of class "replValueSp"; definition not updated
names(results) <- paste0("k_", k_values)
results
#> $k_2
